name: Chateau d'Ige

reviews.title: Your Own Castle
reviews.text: Behind the walls of this castle, you will feel as if you have stepped back in time. The grounds and garden are beautiful. The only sounds you will hear are the birds and the insects. The Park Tower Room is a two story masterpiece of charm and comfort. The food served by the chateau is unbelievably good and fully priced. The staff could not be more friendly or helpful. Definitely will return here.

description: In southern Burgundy, a region rich in history, dotted with Romanesque chapels, the four-star restaurant of the Château d’Igé is there to welcome you.The 13th-century feudal château, built under the reign of King Saint Louis, is surrounded by tranquil gardens with thriving vegetation.Françoise Faucon, the owner and manager, welcomes you with the highly professional assistance of her staff, and especially chef Olivier Pons.For a gastronomic outing or a prolonged visit, you will rediscover the charm, both mysterious and familiar, of the Middle Ages.Meals are served in fine weather on the terrace shaded by centuries-old trees, or in one of the dining rooms with French-style ceilings and wood fires.
